mapper.sql: sysid, stNo, stTitle, stOptionA, stOptionB, stOptionC, stOptionD, stAnswer, stParse, stStatus
mapper.select:
select
from subject
stStatus = "1"
and stNo = #{stNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and stTitle like concat('%',#{stTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into subject (sysid, stNo, stTitle, stOptionA, stOptionB, stOptionC, stOptionD, stAnswer, stParse, stStatus) values (#{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoptiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoptionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoptionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoptiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stparse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select replace(uuid(),'-','')
insert into subject
sysid,
stNo,
stTitle,
stOptionA,
stOptionB,
stOptionC,
stOptionD,
stAnswer,
stParse,
stStatus,

mapper.update:
update subject
stNo = #{stno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stTitle = #{sttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stOptionA = #{stoptiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stOptionB = #{stoptionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stOptionC = #{stoptionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stOptionD = #{stoptiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stAnswer = #{stanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

stStatus = #{ststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sysid = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update subject set stNo = #{stno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stTitle = #{sttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stOptionA = #{stoptiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stOptionB = #{stoptionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stOptionC = #{stoptionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stOptionD = #{stoptiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stAnswer = #{stanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stParse = #{stparse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stStatus = #{ststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sysid = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
